title: Hhampuz
author: Hhampuz
created_time: August 06, 2023, 01:22:05 PMLast edit: August 21, 2023, 08:39:15 PM by Hhampuz
content: Bitget is no newcomer when it comes to exchanges and they've only improved their services since their initial launch. To help spread awareness here on Bitcointalk we are launching this Signature Campaign and if you are a quality poster who frequents the English language boards we want to hire YOU!Rules and Requirements:Wear the Signature and Avatar.Make a minimum of 20 posts each week that you participate in order to receive a payment.Make a minimum of 10 posts in the gambling sections each week in order to receive a payment. These 10 will count towards the 20 total posts per week.Do not have any legitimate negative feedback from a DT member.If you receive legitimate negative feedback from a DT member during your stay you may be removed without payment or notice.Posts in Off-Topic, Games and Rounds, campaign/bounty threads, local boards as well as places where your signature is not displayed will not be counted towards the weekly requirement.You need to have received a minimum of 5 merit in the last 120 days to join this campaign.Do not wear any other Signature or Avatar during your stay in this campaign or you will be removed without payment or notice.Do not enroll your main + alt in this campaign, if it's found out you've done so you'll be removed without payment and blacklisted from all of my campaigns.This campaign will be open for Hero and Legendary Members.Each payment will be sent directly to your bech32 BTC address each Tuesday.Each week will run from Tuesdays to Mondays with the cut-off being Mondays 23.59:59 according to my timezone (CET).Bitget reserves the right to make any changes or cancel this campaign at their discretion. Each started week will be paid out in full!Payouts and Positions:7x Hero/Legendary Members - $70 in BTC / week.The Signature:Code:[center][table][tr][td][font=arial Welcome to the Campaign, please update your Signatures and Avatars within the next 3 hours as that's when we're live with the first week.Thank you all for your applications, we are now CFNP.

comments.author: Hhampuz
comments.body: Round 1 Payments have been sent out!Thank you all for a fantastic first week of this campaign, keep it up! No new positions have opened up.

comments.author: Hhampuz
comments.body: Round 2 Payments have been sent out!Thank you all for these past 2 weeks, it's been a pleasure to work with you all!The Bitget team has informed me that we'll put the campaign on hold for now while they'll look at other things to do. It may come back in a different shape in the future but as it stands right now it can be considered FIN. Thank you all once again, you can now remove your Signatures and Avatars.

comments.author: Dunamisx
comments.body: Quote from: Hhampuz on August 21, 2023, 10:00:12 PMRound 2 Payments have been sent out!Thank you all for these past 2 weeks, it's been a pleasure to work with you all!The Bitget team has informed me that we'll put the campaign on hold for now while they'll look at other things to do. It may come back in a different shape in the future but as it stands right now it can be considered FIN. Thank you all once again, you can now remove your Signatures and Avatars.Thank you Hhampuz, payment received and thanks to Bitget team as well, two weeks working together is of a good experience to talk about, it's a great privilege and wish the Bitget team more success, it will also be my pleasure working with you Hhampuz in the nearest future, thanks for the good works.

comments.author: pakhitheboss
comments.body: Quote from: Hhampuz on August 21, 2023, 10:00:12 PMRound 2 Payments have been sent out!Thank you all for these past 2 weeks, it's been a pleasure to work with you all!The Bitget team has informed me that we'll put the campaign on hold for now while they'll look at other things to do. It may come back in a different shape in the future but as it stands right now it can be considered FIN. Thank you all once again, you can now remove your Signatures and Avatars.Thanks, Hhampuz and Bitget team for this fantastic opportunity. I hope to see you guys again with a new campaign.

comments.author: Nesspay
comments.created_time: October 14, 2023, 05:53:35 PMLast edit: October 14, 2023, 06:03:47 PM by Nesspay
comments.body: Why don’t bring social media and article campaign, my dear sir?   We are still waiting for a good bounty from you. We are missing you a lots in bounty space. Hopefully you bring a social media campaign. Best regardsOn behalf of bounty hunters.

comments.author: MAAManda
comments.body: Quote from: Nesspay on October 14, 2023, 05:53:35 PMWhy don’t bring social media and article campaign.  We are still waiting for a good bounty from you. We are missing you a lots in bounty space. Hopefully you bring a social media campaign. Best regardsOn be half of bounty hungers.It all depends on the request from the client, maybe now the campaigns you mean are no longer so relevant on the forum so the client decides not to create those campaigns here.Currently, crypto is mainstream and there are several large platforms that project owners usually use for marketing purposes and they use it like a bounty system here, for example Galxe. Go there to get what you are looking for.
